title: help with this one please!
content:
hello,

I really like the font used for the links on this webpage  
 [http://www.hyperakt.com/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210013742/http:/www.hyperakt.com/index.php "http://www.hyperakt.com/index.php")

The ones in all-caps “WORK”, “STUDIO”, etc.

I thought about asking the company as well, but you guys seem to be really quick. Plus I’m wondering, if it’s an expensive font, if you guys know of any similar ones that are free.

THANK YOU!

 [‹ Titling font ID please](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210013742/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41704 "Go to previous forum topic") [Firefly logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210013742/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41711 "Go to next forum topic")
author: who8myoreos
